attributes.additional_details:
no long bio here.
this is a campaign that is brought up youths of the modern day, who from a survey decided that youths aren't safe on the streets. From this survey me and my team came up with Safe-D an organisation that aims to raise awareness of the attacking on the youth.

Check out our video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=geATlQn9cTw&feature=plcp


if you have twitter sign our petition online :http://twitition.com/hqnnm


and we hope to start with local areas and work all around UK
